Text:
Great uploads!  Thnx!

But, did you notice that from about 7:12 on, the video freezes (or goes blank)?  Every other upload has been perfect on my system, except this one.  Any chance of a re-creation?

Thanks again!
I am impressed.... I truly am YIFY! You actually managed to only lose 40 pixels on the vertical. That's way better than what it used to be!
